original_title: インフルエンサー 恥辱の絶頂配信
overview: Hoshira, an influencer who is popular among young people, suddenly receives a video of his sister's live performance. On the screen is the indecent appearance of a sister who is captured and trained for pleasure! "Onee-chan, help me!"
title: A Social Media Influencer Receives A Transmission Featuring Embarrassing Orgasms. Sora Hoshino
